rows.label: qev092204_MSG0001
rows.name:
The Black Steel Continent seems to be
far north of the Primordial Wilderness, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0002
rows.name:
They say it's difficult to pass through
the White Tree Continent in between without considerable strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0003
rows.name:
It seems there's also a detour route, swimming through the sea
and landing on the west coast of the Black Steel Continent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you're not confident, I think avoiding the White Tree Continent
is also an option. Anyway, just make sure you and Himeri-chan
come back alive together, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0005
rows.name:
An urgent consultation? Sorry[ST:wide ]—
Himeri-chan is out at the moment[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0006
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—Ah, welcome back! How did it go?
Were you able to complete the mission safely?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0007
rows.name: Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0007_2
rows.name: Lularita-san seemed very happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0008
rows.name:
That's good, isn't it?
So, was it the usual working for free again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0009
rows.name:
Er, no. Though frankly,
it's my friend here who deserves the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0009_m
rows.name:
Er, no. Though frankly,
it's my friend here who deserves the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0009_f
rows.name:
Er, no. Though frankly,
it's my friend here who deserves the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0010
rows.name:
Honestly, it's always the same...
You end up in the red every time you take a job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0011
rows.name:
[ST:wide ]—Here, this is something everyone donated
for Himeri-chan, but you should take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0011
rows.name: Accept gratefully.

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0021
rows.name: Politely decline.

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0012
rows.name:
That's right. You're not Himeri-chan,
so you shouldn't do volunteer work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's fine, really. Even if we keep it here,
this girl won't use any of it anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0014
rows.name:
Well then, here you go.
Thanks for helping her out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0015
rows.name: Um...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0015_2
rows.name:
Just that... I don't think it's enough
to repay all the help you gave me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0016
rows.name: Please...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0016_2
rows.name:
Would it be okay if I helped you out
now and then with your work?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0017
rows.name:
Oh my. It's rare for Himeri-chan
to ask someone for something so forcefully[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0018
rows.name:
It seems like it would be good life experience for her, too.
I'm asking you too, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0031
rows.name: Say you'd be happy to have her.

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask Question

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask if her work handling requests
from citizens will be okay.

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0019
rows.name:
Thank you very much.
I'll do my best not to be a burden.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0020
rows.name:
That's what assistants are for!
Leave that side of things to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0021
rows.name: Thank you, Ornela-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0022
rows.name: [ST:wide ]—Well then, I look forward to working with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0023
rows.name: Let's make the people of NLA happy together!
